title: Discovery
body:
I've discovered something extraordinary -  the key to this dimensions' effect on humans - giving them immortality.
I've discovered that the cause of this phenomenon, a special energy in the core of the main planet. I'm not sure exactly what it is though; but I think part of it is caused by this special dusty mineral.
I've named it 'Draconium', as it can be used to make multiple dragon-themed things; due to the interesting properties of this dimension. - Dr. Wynter, Log #10
